CONTRACT_ID: url_TMSrequires a PhD in a relevant field such as Business, Management, Management Science or Economics with a minimum of 30 years of relevant experience. Alternatively, a Master's degree from a accredited Canadian university with a minimum of 30 years of relevant experience or 5 years of Post-Doctoral research experience. No other Substitute qualifications or equivalencies will be considered. Any relevant experience involve Change Management progressing the transformation of the client organization by the demonstration of respected leadership abilities and providing value added thinking during the promotion of innovation and sustaible change.
short_summary: The Crown is seeking the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)  For TASK AND SOLUTIONS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES ..., The Crown is seeking the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services.  This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services to acquire the services of a Senior Change Management consultant, on an as-and-when required basis, for the provision of strategic advice and facilitation services to the Transformation and Modernization Services directorate
